divs: Sighting DetailsOn the above event, there isn't much to tell. The incident in March I'd like to dicuss. I'm not comfortable writing it here.
Summary: Driving past the Shutesbury Post Office with my son, we saw amassive object below tree line. No engine sounds. I saw it for three to five seconds. Approximately fourty to fifty feet across and looking like a boomerang. My son saw it the longest.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Shutesbury
There were no other sightings in Shutesbury on or around February 21st 2008
